index.desc: Experience the next-gen revolution, offering a list of features and extensive customization, providing a superior alternative to popular bots.
index.fun.desc: Have you ever dreamed of not using MEE6™? Just use Wamellow instead and don't pay premium to personalise your cards and webpages!
index.leaderboard.desc: Enhance your server’s engagement with our text-, voice- and invite based leaderboards, tailored to track and reward your most active members. By motivating your members to communicate, you’ll cultivate a more active server community.
